bm.EventEmitter.name: bm.EventEmitter
bm.EventEmitter.description: EventEmitter implements an interface for registering, unregistering, and triggering events.

bm.name: bm

bm.Device.name: bm.Device
bm.Device.description:
Each connected device is represented by an instance of this class. 

Communicating with a particular device is done through this class' methods.

bm.DeviceAvailableEvent.name: bm.DeviceAvailableEvent
bm.DeviceAvailableEvent.description:
Event called when a mobile device first establishes a connection. 

**Note:**

bm.DeviceConnectedEvent.name: bm.DeviceConnectedEvent
bm.DeviceConnectedEvent.description: Event called when a mobile device successfully established a connection.

bm.DeviceDisconnectedEvent.name: bm.DeviceDisconnectedEvent
bm.DeviceDisconnectedEvent.description: Event called when a mobile device is disconnected.

bm.ButtonEvent.name: bm.ButtonEvent
bm.ButtonEvent.description: Event for when a button was pressed or released.

bm.ShakeEvent.name: bm.ShakeEvent
bm.ShakeEvent.description: Event indicating the user shook their device.

bm.ShowSlotColorEvent.name: bm.ShowSlotColorEvent
bm.ShowSlotColorEvent.description:
Event called when the SDK has received it's assigned slot index/color.

This is the unique color that is displayed in top right of the console, in your game, and 
on the device list in the controller app. It's used to help users disambiguate which
console/game they want to connect to, if there is more than one on your network.

classitems.description: Register a callback for a particular event.
classitems.name: addEventListener

params.name: fn
params.description: Function to be called back when the event occurs.

classitems.description: Alias for {EventEmitter.addEventListener}
classitems.name: on

classitems.description: Unregister a callback for a particular event.
classitems.name: removeEventListener

params.name: eventType
params.description: Which event to stop listening to.

classitems.description: Alias for {EventEmitter.removeEventListener}
classitems.name: off

classitems.description: Trigger an event. (Calls all the callbacks that are listening for this event's type.)
classitems.name: trigger

params.name: event
params.description: Event that will be passed to all registered listeners.

classitems.description:
Version number of the SDK. 

Format:

    Major.Minor.Patch

Example:

    "0.5.1"
    
Follows the [Semantic Versioning Specification.](http://semver.org)
classitems.name: version

classitems.description: Startup Brass Monkey
classitems.name: start

props.name: name
props.description:
The name of your game. This is what 
    is displayed on the phone when you pick what to connect to.
    
    Example: "Monkey Golf"

props.name: appID
props.description:
The unique identifier of your Game/App. You
    must generate this through the developer admin interface.

props.name: maxPlayers
props.description: The number of players that can play your game.

props.name: swfURL
props.description:
The location of the SWF file that implements 
    the SDK when there a browser doesn't support Websockets. 
    
    If not provided the matching version on the Brass Monkey CDN is used.

classitems.description: Shutdown Brass Monkey
classitems.name: stop

classitems.description:
Shutdown Brass Monkey. 

This will close all open network connections and disconnect all controllers.
classitems.name: stop

classitems.description: Event called when a mobile device successfully established a connection.
classitems.name: deviceavailable

classitems.description: Event called when a mobile device successfully established a connection.
classitems.name: deviceconnected

classitems.description: Event called when a mobile device is disconnected.
classitems.name: devicedisconnected

classitems.description: Event called when a button was pressed down.
classitems.name: buttondown

classitems.description: Event called when a button was released.
classitems.name: buttonup

classitems.description: Event indicating the user shook their device.
classitems.name: shake

classitems.description:
Display name of the user associated with this device.

If the user is logged in on their device this will be their profile name, otherwise it will be the name they gave their device.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: The unique identifier of this device.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description:
Enable/Disable touch events.

Touch events are off by default to reduce network traffic and should only be enabled if you are doing touch based controls.
classitems.name: enableTouch

params.name: enable
params.description: If 'true' touches are enabled, if 'false' touches are disabled.

classitems.description: Set the interval at which touch events are sent from the controller app.
classitems.name: setTouchInterval

params.name: interval
params.description: The interval in seconds at which touch events will be sent.

classitems.description:
Enable/Disable accelerometer events.

Accelerometer events are off by default to reduce network traffic and should only be enabled if you are doing accelerometer based controls.
classitems.name: enableAccelerometer

params.name: enable
params.description: If 'true' accelerometer events are enabled, if 'false' accelerometer events are disabled.

classitems.description: Set the interval at which acclerometer events are sent from the controller app.
classitems.name: setAccelerometerInterval

params.name: interval
params.description: The interval in seconds at which accelerometer events will be sent.

classitems.description:
Enable/Disable gyroscope events.

Gyroscope events are off by default to reduce network traffic and should only be enabled if you are doing gyroscope based controls.
classitems.name: enableGyroscope

params.name: enable
params.description: If 'true' gyroscope events are enabled, if 'false' gyroscope events are disabled.

classitems.description: Set the interval at which gyroscope events are sent from the controller app.
classitems.name: setGyroscopeInterval

params.name: interval
params.description: The interval in seconds at which gyroscope events will be sent.

classitems.description:
Enable/Disable orientation events.

Touch events are off by default to reduce network traffic and should only be enabled if you are doing touch based controls.
classitems.name: enableOrientation

params.name: enable
params.description: If 'true' orientation events are enabled, if 'false' orientation events are disabled.

classitems.description: Set the interval at which touch events are sent from the controller app.
classitems.name: setOrientationInterval

params.name: interval
params.description: The interval in seconds at which orientation events will be sent.

classitems.description: Set which controller mode the device is in.
classitems.name: setMode

params.name: mode
params.description:
Which mode do you want to set?

  **"gamepad"** Show your custom controller layout.
  
  **"keyboard"** Show the built in keyboard input layout.
  
  **"navigation"** Show the built in navigation input layout.

  **"wait"** Show the waiting/loading screen.

classitems.description: Get which controller mode the device is in.
classitems.name: getMode

classitems.description:
Which event this instance is representing.

Examples: 
    
    "buttondown", "buttonup", or "shake"
classitems.name: type

classitems.description: Device Associated with this event.
classitems.name: device

classitems.description: Device Associated with this event.
classitems.name: device

classitems.description: Device Associated with this event.
classitems.name: device

classitems.description: Device Associated with this event.
classitems.name: device

classitems.description: The id of the button that was pressed/released
classitems.name: button

classitems.description: Device Associated with this event.
classitems.name: device

classitems.description: Device Associated with this event.
classitems.name: device

classitems.description: Unique identifier to your network. (Each instance of Brass Monkey running get it's own slotIndex number)
classitems.name: slotIndex

classitems.description:
Color to display on the screen. (CSS Style Hexidecimal)

Example:

    "#ff0000"
classitems.name: color
